ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Computer Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Also note that some routers have built in firewalls that may interfere with EverQuest. I know for awhile there was a problem with specific Linksys routers. I
ygData.messageBody:
Also note that some routers have built in firewalls that may interfere with
EverQuest.
I know for awhile there was a problem with specific Linksys routers. I don't
know if the problem still exists though.
luv,
-Su

> All you need is a router and enough Ethernet cables to connect each
computer
> to the router, which in turn connects to your DSL modem. You can find a
> four-port router from Linksys or D-Link in most shops that sell computer
> hardware, and they're not too pricey. Configuration shouldn't be too
> difficult, as a lot of consumer routers come with an installation CD that
> will help users to configure their computers and the router to share an
> Internet connection.
>
> Chris
>
